participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Social and adventurous, enjoys meeting new people but struggles with long-term relationships.
participant_1.background: i watch too much tv in spare time. i go to the gym most days just to socialize. i've never had a steady relationship. i work from home. i like to spend my money on cars.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Creative and passionate, loves exploring new recipes and enjoys the tranquility of nature while fishing.
participant_2.background: if i am not cooking in the kitchen then i am definitely on the water. l also love comic books. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. spiderman is my favorite. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing.
